thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Westminster - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Review -
thread.title_full: Review - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 400kate2017
title: Review -
text: Excellent location. Accidentally booked an accessible room with no windows and the room was still lovely. Didn't spend a lot of time in room but sleep well, very comfortable beds. Outlets and tv's did not work when we first got there but the front desk was extremely helpful and resolved the issue in seconds. Great hotel, definitely recommend.
